preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 10 g of magnesium using a digital scale. 
 2. Weigh 10 g of scandium. 
 3. Measure 80 g of tin. 
 4. Measure 20 g of technetium. 
 5. In a clean, dry mixing container, combine all ingredients uniformly using a spatula. Ensure no clumps remain.
